duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and manage the Quality Assurance activities including updates, validations, assessments, and analyses of vehicles.
Monitor vehicle quality by analyzing development maturity level and repetitive failures reported by drivers and Quality Assurance teams.
Perform root cause analysis using diagnostic tools and software.
Plausibility check of the results of the measurement data analysis and implementation of validation tests.
Manage and coordinate Analytics- and Workshop-Team for Quality Assurance.
Creation of Quality Assurance documents, reports, error analyses and process documentation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Automotive, Mechanical or Electrical Engineering (Master's preferred)
